description: A versatile leather sandal that shines just about anywhere. In a clean modern style, these leather sandals pair perfectly with summertime. They're as comfortable as they are versatile, perfect for the office or for weekend shenanigans.Premium leather upper is durable in a modern design that's got some edge.Leather lining provides a smooth and comfortable fit.Polyurethane midsole provides cushioning and support.Leather-wrapped PU insole is soft and comfortable.High traction TPU outsole is durable and grippy.
name: Keen Lana Cross Strap Sandals - Women's
